attributes.action: Ban Sharia Laws in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Stop allowing Muslims to enforce their laws in England.
This is becoming a real problem and the government is not taking action, not all Muslims want this, but those that do are doing serious crimes in our country and being allowed by police, and if someone tries to speak out against it they are branded as racist. Stop allowing our country which was fought for so many times to stay a British country with British laws.
